ch.aplu.ev3

Class GenericIRSensor.IRValue

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.aplu.ev3.GenericIRSensor.IRValue
  • Enclosing class:
    GenericIRSensor

    public class GenericIRSensor.IRValue
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to combine channel, bearing and distance values.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int bearing
      The bearing value from about -12 to +12 with values increasing clockwise when looking from behind the sensor.
      int channel
      The channel number 1..4
      int distance
      Distance values (0-100) are in cm.

    • Field Detail

      • channel

        public int channel
        The channel number 1..4

      • bearing

        public int bearing
        The bearing value from about -12 to +12 with values increasing clockwise when looking from behind the sensor. A bearing of 0 indicates the beacon is directly in front of the sensor. If no beacon is detected, a bearing of 0 is returned.

      • distance

        public int distance
        Distance values (0-100) are in cm. If no beacon is detected a distance of 255 is returned.

      • GenericIRSensor.IRValue

        public GenericIRSensor.IRValue()
